value:
$WmMPID_ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You must be Prince Alfonse of
the Askran Kingdom. Pleased to
make your acquaintance.$k$pI'm Roy. I know I look young, but
I'm leading the forces of Pherae
on my father's behalf.$k$pI know that it's not very noble to
point my blade at other fine
members of royalty.$k$pBut I'm afraid that we're all bound
by contract. I hope you'll forgive
me for what we must now do.$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Your group is as strong as they say!
But our contract is not yet broken.
And so, I will see you again.$k$Sbs150|
